content: Deepak MishraSearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationAssistant ProfessorComputer Science and EngineeringIIT JodhpurMy journey began in 2010 with Healthcare R&D team in Siemens Information Systems Ltd. I was fortunate to work with some of the best mentors on challenging problems. It setup platform for an in-depth and rigorous research and motivated me to join IIT Delhi for higher studies. I explored different domains while remaining active in my doctoral research. I am continuing my journey as Assistant Professor at the Department of Computer Science and Engineering, IIT Jodhpur.I am interested in fundamental and applied research problems related to deep learning, medical image analysis, and responsible AI. I have funded PhD and RA positions available in my group. Students with strong research aptitude are encouraged to contact with updated resumes. My research group, Medical AI Systems (MAISys) at IIT Jodhpur, is constantly working towards the development and deployment of AI-driven medical technologies.
